apple_vendor_description: This heartwarming emoji on Apple devices depicts a couple embracing, with the woman having a light skin tone and the man a medium-dark skin tone, both rendered with Apple's signature realistic lighting and soft, rounded forms.  A vibrant, glossy red heart floats between them, symbolizing their deep affection and connection, its polished surface reflecting light beautifully.  The gentle posture and harmonious blend of skin tones communicate love, romance, and strong partnership, making it a cherished symbol of relationships on Apple devices.
